com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.control

Class ExceptionDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.control.Dialog
      • com.gluonhq.charm.glisten.control.ExceptionDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class ExceptionDialog
extends Dialog

    A Dialog to display exceptions. This Dialog is a fullscreen Dialog composed of an introduction text, the exception message and the stacktrace.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    Dialog
